definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: These drawings depict the life of the Soviet Gulag prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 这系列的图片描述的是苏联时期古拉格囚犯们的生活。

sentences.english: Could you please put the gulags back up here?
sentences.chinese: 你要让这里也出现“古拉格群岛”吗？

sentences.english: It is simply wrong to maintain that the gulag was nothing more than a modernized version of its czarist predecessor.
sentences.chinese: 认为古拉格仅仅是现代化的帝俄流放地是完全错误的。

sentences.english: Some observers even suggested he might be sent to the gulag.
sentences.chinese: 一些观察家甚至暗示他可能会被送到了古拉格。

definition: labor camp/prison camp with hard labor
Alexandr Solzhenitsyn (1918-2008), Russian writer, prominent Soviet dissident, author of the Gulag Archipelago
